transform_def.name: designed24
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = lerp(cos(abs(p_in.y)), sin(abs(p_in.x)), 0.5) t = cos(p_in.x * s) * sin(p_in.y / s) * atan2(s * pi(), cos(s)) * (p_in.x * fourpi()) z = t * (r * if r < gauss_rnd_0 * (halfinvpi() / 2.0) then fourpi() else halfinvpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
